edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Conflict, java.lang.Comparable<Course>

    public class Course
extends Activity
implements java.lang.Comparable<Course>
    Course class has setter and getter methods, along with hash() and equals(). This class is a subclass of the parent class called activities. If the activity that is placed into schedule is a course object then it will access specific methods in this class to check if the Course is valid to be added to schedule.
    Author:
    jhnguye4

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays,
              int startTime,
              int endTime)
        Constructs a Course Object with values for all fields. Calls upon the setter methods in the parent and current class to error check and will throw exceptions if appropriate parameters are not used
        Parameters:
        name - name of Course
        title - title of Course
        section - section of Course
        credits - hours for Course
        instructorId - instructor's unity ID
        enrollmentCap - the cap of students for class
        meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars
        startTime - start time for Course
        endTime - end time for Course

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              java.lang.String title,
              java.lang.String section,
              int credits,
              java.lang.String instructorId,
              int enrollmentCap,
              java.lang.String meetingDays)
        Creates a Course with the given name, title, section, credits, instructorID, and meetingDays for course that are arranged. Calls on previous constructor to set values.
        Parameters:
        name - name of Course
        title - title of Course
        section - section of Course
        credits - hours for Course
        instructorId - instructor's unity ID
        enrollmentCap - the cap of students for class
        meetingDays - meeting days for Course as series of chars

        public void setMeetingDays(java.lang.String meetingDays)

        setMeetingDays in class Activity
        Parameters:

      • isDuplicate

        public boolean isDuplicate(Activity activity)
        Method is used to check if Activity is a duplicate to another activity in schedule array. It will first check if the activity is an instanceof Course first before it goes further
        Specified by:
        isDuplicate in class Activity
        Parameters:
        activity - is an Activity object passed through and can either be a Course or Event
        Returns:
        boolean, true if it is a duplicate and false if it is not

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Course c)
        Compares this Course to the Course being passed through the parameter. It will compare the name and then section. It will return depending if this Course is less than, equal to, or greater than the Course object being passed through.
        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<Course>
        Parameters:
        c - Is a Course object being passed through to be compared to this object.
        Returns:
        int depending if this Course is less than, equal to, or greater than the Course object being passed through.
